sentence.Network_en: Complement, Shift, and Rotate operations require one operand.
sentence.Network_cn: “求补”, “移位”和“环移”等操作就只需要一个操作数.

sentence.Network_en: Bring the first operand to the date register.
sentence.Network_cn: 将第一个操作数输入数据寄存器.

sentence.Network_en: An operator or operand in a computer instruction.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算机指令中的操作符或操作数.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin operandum, neuter gerundive of operari 'expend labour on' (see operate)

means.word_mean: 1. a quantity upon which a mathematical operation is performed
